charges.charge_description: unlawfully, knowingly, and intentionally (1) possess with intent to distribute 29.3 grams of a mixture and substance containing a detectable amount of cocaine base, a Schedule II controlled substance and (2) possess with intent to distribute 0.55 grams of a mixture and substance containing a detectable amount of heroin, a Schedule I controlled substance in violation of T.21 USC 841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(B) and (C) [21:841A=ND.F]
